name: Robo-sidekick
description:
The start menu is controlled by the arrow and enter keys. 

Try to save as many people as you can, but don't worry, you're gonna drop a few.

Credit

Art - 

The falling people are modified sprites from Diego Seabra

https://dssdiego.itch.io/simple-pixel-art-character

The background is all modified art from Vimlark

https://vimlark.itch.io/town-asset-pack-16x16
